Installation & Configuration¶

  1. Inside your project root, run

    composer require rashidul/raindrops=dev-master

  2. Add this to your app.php config file’s providers array

    Rashidul\RainDrops\RainDropsServiceProvider::class,

    // publish configs
$this->publishes([
    __DIR__ . '/configs' => config_path('raindrops'),
], 'raindrops');

// publish stub files for the generator
$this->publishes([
    __DIR__ . '/Generator/stubs/' => base_path('resources/raindrops/'),
], 'raindrops');
